frontmatter.title: Upload new attachments and migrate legacy attachments to AWS S3

node.html: Utilized Rails carrierwave gem to upload new attachments to AWS S3, and migrated legacy attachments from Mongodb to AWS S3 buckets.
Built Analytics dashboard for the agencies to view the bidders statistics, including google map integration of the bidder location

frontmatter.title: Test suite parallelization to decrease pipeline run time

node.html: Introduced parallel_tests gem and implemented parallelization of rails tests and made test suite run 6 times faster.

frontmatter.title: Photos application to view construction progress

node.html: Developed a grid view of photos, album feature and capability to see where the photos were uploaded using google API.

frontmatter.title: Email sending UI for marketing automation platform

node.html: Built UI using React JS framework, Ant framework React components and Apollo for state management. Used graphql, with nodejs on the backend.

frontmatter.title: Improve performance of the webpage using memcached

node.html: Created a smooth transition of screen using Ajax loading and stored compute intensive task on memcached with an expiry limit. Also added capability to delete the memcache before expiry, if any transaction made the cache obselete.
